name: Rope Rider: Jungle Jump
description:
Come and meet Rope Rider! Take him to challenging places he has never gone. Time and tap to land perfectly, very simple to play, yet addictive and challenging.

With addictive game play and unlimited levels it will never let you down in your boring times.

Three realistic themes with cool animations makes this game stand apart from rest.

Awesome rain, snow, wind & lightning effects adds realism.

How to Play :

- Touch the screen to jump.
- Land in Green for "PERFECT" Score.
- Continuous "PERFECT" score will fetch more points.
- Tilt your device to position landing.
- Try to achieve top online Ranking.

You can switch accelerometer ON/OFF in settings screen.
You have three lives before the game ends.

Other features :

- Very simple control with Option for tilt control.
- Three realistic themes including snow, forest & land.
- Awesome Rain, Snow, Wind & Lightening special effects.
- Online global Leader boards.
- Unlimited Levels with progressive difficulty.
- Separate local leader board with additional details.
- Excellent Scoring system based on your landing perfection.
